pda.base
Class PdaScreen

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      pda.base.PdaScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class PdaScreen
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The base class of PDA simulator. This class displays the PDA emulator and manage all the applications

Version:
$Revision: 32 $
Author:
F. Merciol, D. Deveaux <{francois.merciol|daniel.deveaux}@univ-ubs.fr>
